name: In My Head, I Was Degrading
name_original: In My Head, I Was Degrading
description:
Controls: <---left & right arrows---> to move, X to jump

Made for Wizard Jam 10. Based on Idle Thumbs episode 316. Inspiration for this game was Celeste, the Veldt, Flappy Bird Arcade Machines, and learning through mistakes. In this episode they complained about bad pixel art games so here's another! This was my first attempt at using PICO-8 using tutorials made by Nerdy Teachers.

This is as far as I got. I'll try to finish this as I have time. Still want to add sound effects, damage, a menu, and dialogue.
